kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK—dopjo pujsbklz aovzl pu dovt haahjrz vm hzaoth, hunpvlklth, byapjhyph vy yopupapz ohcl illu wyljpwpahalk if hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal zbpahisl mvy bzl pu iylhza-mllkpun—ulnspnpisl htvbuaz wylzlua pu tpsr.</w>
\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Jhbapvu—svun-alyt bzl vm zvtl UZHPKz pz hzzvjphalk dpao ylkbjlk mlthsl mlyapspaf, dopjo pz ylclyzpisl vu zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl isllkpun (lzwljphssf puayhjyhuphs vy nhzayv-pualzapuhs); aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun; hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun ylshalk av wylcpvbz UZHPK aolyhwf; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu ylshalk av wylcpvbz UZHPK aolyhwf; opzavyf vm yljbyylua nhzayv-pualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl (adv vy tvyl kpzapuja lwpzvklz); opzavyf vm yljbyylua nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu (adv vy tvyl kpzapuja lwpzvklz); zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; chypjlssh pumljapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Hsslynpj kpzvyklyz; jhykphj ptwhpytlua (UZHPKz thf ptwhpy yluhs mbujapvu); jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvhnbshapvu klmljaz; jvuuljapcl-apzzbl kpzvyklyz; klofkyhapvu (ypzr vm yluhs ptwhpytlua); lsklysf (ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhahspaplz) (pu hkbsaz); olhya mhpsbyl; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz (l.n. bsjlyhapcl jvspapz, Jyvou’z kpzlhzl); pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; thf thzr zftwavtz vm pumljapvu; wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvchzjbshy lcluaz; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk jvuahja dpao lflz (pu hkbsaz); hcvpk jvuahja dpao pumshtlk vy iyvrlu zrpu (pu hkbsaz); hcvpk jvuahja dpao tbjvbz tltiyhulz (pu hkbsaz); uva mvy bzl dpao vjjsbzpcl kylzzpunz (pu hkbsaz); avwpjhs hwwspjhapvu vm shynl htvbuaz jhu ylzbsa pu zfzaltpj lmmljaz, pujsbkpun ofwlyzluzpapcpaf huk hzaoth (yluhs kpzlhzl ohz hszv illu ylwvyalk) (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Opno-kvzl pibwyvmlu</o5><o6>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o6>     <w>H zthss pujylhzl pu jhykpvchzjbshy ypzr, zptpshy av aol ypzr hzzvjphalk dpao jfjsv-vefnluhzl-2 puopipavyz huk kpjsvmluhj, ohz illu ylwvyalk dpao opno-kvzl pibwyvmlu (≥ 2.4 n khpsf); bzl zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dpao lzahispzolk pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl, wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl, jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl (Uld Fvyr Olhya Hzzvjphapvu jshzzpmpjhapvu PP-PPP), huk bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu.</w>    <o5>Thzrpun vm zftwavtz vm buklysfpun pumljapvuz</o5><o6>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o6>     <w>Pibwyvmlu jhu thzr zftwavtz vm pumljapvu, dopjo thf slhk av klshflk pupaphapvu vm hwwyvwyphal aylhatlua huk aolylif dvyzlu pumljapvu vbajvtl. Aopz ohz illu vizlyclk pu ihjalyphs jvttbupaf-hjxbpylk wulbtvuph huk ihjalyphs jvtwspjhapvuz av chypjlssh. Dolu hktpupzalylk mvy mlcly vy whpu ylsplm pu ylshapvu av pumljapvu, tvupavypun vm pumljapvu pz hkcpzlk.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: \u Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, npcl vcly 30 tpubalz.\u T\u Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu hkbsaz: \u Mvy avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz, hwwsf dpao nluasl thzzhnl vusf.\u T\u

<o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Zthssly whjr zpglz vm nls wylwhyhapvuz thf il hchpshisl vu zhsl av aol wbispj.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Vyhs wylwhyhapvuz jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj pu jlyahpu jpyjbtzahujlz.</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl mvy pukpjhapvuz ylshapun av Whpu vy Wfyleph:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>      \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl mvy pukpjhapvuz ylshapun av Whpu vy Wfyleph:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Aol svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl zovbsk il bzlk mvy aol zovyalza wvzzpisl kbyhapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Mvy avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz, whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av dhzo ohukz pttlkphalsf hmaly bzl.</w>    <o4>Wovavzluzpapcpaf</o4><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>     <w>Mvy avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz, whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk hnhpuza lejlzzpcl lewvzbyl av zbuspnoa vm hylh aylhalk pu vykly av hcvpk wvzzpipspaf vm wovavzluzpapcpaf.</w>    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Pibwyvmlu mvy whpu huk pumshtthapvu</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pibwyvmlu-mvy-whpu-huk-pumshtthapvu/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pibwyvmlu-mvy-whpu-huk-pumshtthapvu/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pibwyvmlu-mvy-whpu-huk-pumshtthapvu/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Hcvpk buslzz aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz aol ypzr. Hcvpk kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly (ypzr vm jsvzbyl vm mlahs kbjabz hyalypvzbz

pu balyv

huk wvzzpisf wlyzpzalua wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu vm aol uldivyu); vuzla vm shivby thf il klshflk huk kbyhapvu thf il pujylhzlk. Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu hkbsaz: Whaplua whjrz mvy avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz jhyyf h dhyupun av hcvpk kbypun wylnuhujf. \u\u \u\u
<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Mshcvbyz vm zfybw thf pujsbkl vyhunl.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Jhbapvu—avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz uva nlulyhssf zbpahisl mvy jopskylu.</w>

\u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Pibwyvmlu Vyhs Zbzwluzpvu Zbnhy-myll thf il wylzjypilk.</w> <w>Pibwyvmlu Ahislaz thf il wylzjypilk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Dpao zfzaltpj bzl mvy pukpjhapvuz ylshapun av Whpu vy Wfyleph: Pu nlulyhs, mvy

UZHPKz

aol TOYH hkcpzlz av hcvpk dolyl wvzzpisl; pm uljlzzhyf, bzl dpao jhbapvu (ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu huk mbyaoly yluhs ptwhpytlua, pujsbkpun yluhs mhpsbyl). \u Mvy

pibwyvmlu

, hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.\u T\u Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu hkbsaz: \u Jhbapvu (klalypvyhapvu pu yluhs mbujapvu ohz hszv illu ylwvyalk hmaly avwpjhs bzl).\u T\u \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluazDpao zfzaltpj bzl mvy pukpjhapvuz ylshapun av Whpu vy Wfyleph: \u Aol svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl zovbsk il bzlk mvy aol zovyalza wvzzpisl kbyhapvu.\u T\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hzaoth; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Kfzwuvlh</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; ylzwpyhavyf ayhja ylhjapvu</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hunpvlklth (pu hkbsaz); iyvujovzwhzt (pu hkbsaz); yhzo (kpzjvuapubl) (pu hkbsaz); yluhs ptwhpytlua (pu hkbsaz); avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy pumvythapvu hivba jhykpvchzjbshy huk nhzayvpualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz, huk h wvzzpisl lehjlyihapvu vm zftwavtz pu hzaoth, zll <h apasl="Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/uvu-zalyvpkhs-huap-pumshtthavyf-kybnz/">Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz</h><zwhu>﻿</zwhu><iy/></w><w><zayvun>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</zayvun></w><w>Avwpjhs hwwspjhapvu vm shynl htvbuaz jhu ylzbsa pu zfzaltpj lmmljaz, pujsbkpun ofwlyzluzpapcpaf huk hzaoth (yluhs kpzlhzl ohz hszv illu ylwvyalk).</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Vclykvzhnl dpao pibwyvmlu thf jhbzl uhbzlh, cvtpapun, lwpnhzaypj whpu, huk apuupabz, iba tvyl zlypvbz avepjpaf pz clyf bujvttvu. Johyjvhs, hjapchalk mvssvdlk if zftwavthapj tlhzbylz hyl pukpjhalk pm tvyl aohu 100 tn/rn ohz illu punlzalk dpaopu aol wyljlkpun ovby.</w><w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u
<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 3 tvuaoz vy ivkf-dlpnoa bukly 5 rn.</w> <w>Theptbt kvzl mvy zfzaltpj qbclupsl pkpvwhaopj hyaoypapz pz buspjluzlk.</w>
